overview:
Jonathan Bentz is an internet marketing professional at ProspectMX, a Lancaster, PA-based internet marketing company. He also directs content development for the Olympic Fantasy Sports Network, a collection of blogs about fantasy sports that includes Fantasy Baseball Dugout.

Bentz also serves on the Board of Directors for Celebration For Life, a cancer fundraising organization in Lancaster, PA.

Previous to working at ProspectMX, Bentz spent 23 months as an Assistant Marketing Manager at Nemacolin Woodlands Resort, a luxury four-season resort located in Farmington, PA. As an Assistant Marketing Manager, Bentz was responsible for all internet-related projects of four websites, including nemacolin.com. He also developed an e-mail marketing schedule and organic search optimization plan to increase site visits, online bookings, retail sales, and call volume.

Bentz has also held internship and employment experiences that involve moderating message boards, developing site content plans, and composing marketing communications for companies in a variety of industries.
